titleStmt.title: Cosmographie in four bookes : containing the chorographie and historie of the whole vvorld, and all the principall kingdomes, provinces, seas and isles thereof / by Peter Heylyn.
Microcosmus
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: Books 1-3 and both parts of book 4 each have a special t.p.; books 1-3 paged separately, book 4 paged continuously.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
